mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_POST WHERE A_ID IN (SELECT A_ID FROM ACTIVITY_INFO WHERE S_ID = #{sId})

SELECT P.a_post_id, P.a_id, P.a_img_id, P.a_post_content, P.a_view_cnt, P.a_favorite_cnt, P.a_post_date_created FROM ACTIVITY_POST P JOIN ACTIVITY_INFO A ON (P.A_ID = A.A_ID) WHERE S_ID = #{sId} ORDER BY A_POST_DATE_CREATED DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM ACTIVITY_CUSTOMER WHERE A_ID = #{postId}) A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.U_ID = M.U_ID) JOIN RESERVATION R ON (R.U_ID = M.U_ID) WHERE R.A_ID = #{postId}

SELECT M.U_NICK, M.U_NAME, M.U_TEL, M.U_EMAIL, R.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM ACTIVITY_CUSTOMER WHERE A_ID = #{postId}) A JOIN MEMBER M ON (A.U_ID = M.U_ID) JOIN RESERVATION R ON (R.U_ID = M.U_ID) WHERE R.A_ID = #{postId} LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{start}
